text: Lycée La Condamine is a French international school in Quito, Ecuador."Contacts." Lycée La Condamine. Retrieved on 21 March 2015. "Localisation: Calle Japón Y Naciones Unidas" It has programmes from the primary level until the terminale, the final year of lycée (senior high school)."Programme du Secondaire." Lycée La Condamine. Retrieved on 21 March 2015. ==References== ==External links== * Lycée La Condamine Category:International schools in Quito Category:Secondary schools in Quito Category:French international schools in South America
title: Lycée La Condamine
